mapper.select: with recursive CTE as ( select cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef, 1 as level from tb_category where cateCodeRef = 0 union all select c.cateName, c.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, 1 + level as level from tb_category c inner join CTE on c.cateCodeRef = CTE.cateCode ) select cateCode, ifnull(cateCodeRef, 0) as cateCodeRef, cateName, level from CTE;
